result.arabic_text: وَمَن جَآءَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ فَكُبَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِي ٱلنَّارِ هَلۡ تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
result.translation: But whoever comes with an evil deed[30] will be thrown on their faces in the Fire. Are you recompensed except for what you used to do?
result.footnotes: [30] Without having repented from disbelief or sins.
